tag.raw: PAX Mennonite Central Committee Voluntary Service Europe
tag.author: 52529054@N06

description._content:
Caption: With this photo booklet, we the Pax men of Europe want to express our appreciation for the way our director and personal friend, Ray Kauffman, has given of himself in so many ways that we could be more effective in the service of Christ. Our Pax experience has been filled with many extras - Palestine Pilgrimage, Peace Conference, study seminar - largely through the initiative and creative direction of Ray. When the passing of years has dimmed the more vivid memories of our service with Pax we will recall with thankfulness, as we leaf through these pages, that the experiences which were ours were made richer through the efforts Ray extended in our behalf. Signed, every Paxmen.

Citation: PAX Collection, 1945-2006. Isabel Gingrich Glanzer 1959 Scrapbook. HM1-927 Box 3 Folder 4 photo 1. Mennonite Church USA Archives - Goshen. Goshen, Indiana.
